Drawings that Count

Panama Canal Futures Exchange: Sculpting in Time

Sang Hoon Oh
2006, Diploma Unit 15, Architectural Association

The waiting time in international waters at either end of the canal is relocated to the centre of the transit through locks in Gatun Lake. Thus in this drawing of time, transit and space, the canalâ€™s middle swells with waiting: the site of trading.
